title: What is the meaning behind the Tavola dei Genii degli Elementi Numi Divini Coorti dei 72 Genii Cabalistici?
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses the Tavola dei Genii degli Elementi Numi Divini and provides insights into their nature and significance in Kabbalistic tradition. The table represents the stages of human evolution and adaptation to real life. The author explains that people seek the Genii Re dell'oro or Swart the Genii by invoking them outside themselves but should instead approach their own sidereal body to achieve their potential. The author also draws parallels between Christians adoring and invoking Christ and their slow transition to the Christ type. The final 200 tokens contain observations about the correspondence between the head, heart and feet of the body, and their spiritual significance. The author also provides explanations for the appearances of angels to different people as per their nature and condition.

Raccomando intera l'attenzione del mio discepolo. La tradizione volgarizzata ricorda che gli Angeli o spiriti mandati da Dio sono apparsi agli uomini sotto diverse forme e secondo la natura e la condizione di chi li vedeva. Per esempio a Giuseppe l'angelo appare nel sogno, e perché' non manifestatamente, ad occhi aperti, come a Zaccaria, ai pastori, alla Vergine? Il Rendino dice nei suoi commenti all'arte cabalistica, che a coloro che non credevano apparve in forma materiale, agli altri no.
last_phrase: In conclusion, according to the teachings of the Cabala, the appearance of angels or geniuses can take different forms depending on the perception of the individual. Whether visible or intangible, the spirit within us is capable of understanding and recognizing their presence, leading us closer to the divine truth.
